sentence.text: In a large Scottish pedigree, a balanced translocation t (1;11)(q42.1;q14.3) disrupting the microtubule cytoskeleton organization and DISC2 genes segregates with major mental illness, including schizophrenia and depression.
A frame-shift carboxyl-terminal deletion was reported in microtubule cytoskeleton organization in an American family with schizophrenia, but subsequently found in two controls.
